# The `CDSortImpl` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The implementation of the Cache-Directed Sort (CDSort) algorithm for ordering functions represented by a call graph. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The implementation of the Cache-Directed Sort (CDSort) algorithm for ordering functions represented by a call graph.

The two chains are not modified in the method.

### getBestMergeGain() {#a8e4231b699be14ce7160b86a045c519e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MergeGainT anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeLayout.cpp&#125;::CDSortImpl::getBestMergeGain (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chainedge">ChainEdge</a> &#42; Edge) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Compute the gain of merging two chains.

The function considers all possible ways of merging two chains and computes the one having the largest increase in ExtTSP objective. The result is a pair with the first element being the gain and the second element being the corresponding merging type.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/codelayout-cpp/#l01209">1209</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/codelayout-cpp">CodeLayout.cpp</a>.
